semantics.label: Editor delle domande di Image Hotspot

fields.label: Immagine di sfondo
fields.description: Seleziona un'immagine da usare come sfondo alla domanda di Image Hotspot.

fields.label: Punti focali (Hotspots)
fields.description: Drag and drop the desired figure from the toolbar to create a new hotspot. Double-click to edit an existing hotspot. Drag the hotspot to move it. Pull the resize handler in the lower right corner to resize.

fields.label: Correct
fields.description: There can be multiple correct hotspots. However, the user gets correct/incorrect feedback immediately after first click.

fields.label: Feedback if the user selects an empty spot:
fields.placeholder: You didn't locate any hotspots, try again!
